li: Purchase a valid TLS certificate. You may purchase a valid TLS key from VeriSign, Thawte, or your web hosting provider. Follow the vendor's instructions for purchasing the TLS certificate. The certificate is usually a .cer file. Make sure the certificate matches all domains used by the application.

Import the valid TLS certificate. The exact instructions for importing TLS certificates are different for different application servers. Please, refer to your application server's documentation or technical support for detailed instructions on how to install TLS certificates.

Configure the web application server to use TLS. The exact instructions for configuring web application servers to use TLS are different for different platforms. Please, refer to your application server's documentation or technical support for detailed instructions on how to install TLS certificates.

links.text: Use TLS for All Sensitive Pages

html:
Applies to

  • PHP

What to Do

Use valid TLS certificates.

Why

Using valid TLS certificates helps prevent phishing attacks by assuring visitors that your site is secure and trusted.

How

To use a valid TLS certificate:

  1. Purchase a valid TLS certificate. You may purchase a valid TLS key from VeriSign, Thawte, or your web hosting provider. Follow the vendor's instructions for purchasing the TLS certificate. The certificate is usually a .cer file. Make sure the certificate matches all domains used by the application.

  2. Import the valid TLS certificate. The exact instructions for importing TLS certificates are different for different application servers. Please, refer to your application server's documentation or technical support for detailed instructions on how to install TLS certificates.

  3. Configure the web application server to use TLS. The exact instructions for configuring web application servers to use TLS are different for different platforms. Please, refer to your application server's documentation or technical support for detailed instructions on how to install TLS certificates.

Additional Resources

  • For more information about importing TLS certificates into common Web Servers, please see http://www.directnic.com/help/guides/index.php?guide_id=7

Transport Layer Protection Guidelines

  • Use TLS
  • Use TLS for All Sensitive Pages
  • Use Only Strong TLS Algorithms
  • Use Valid TLS Certificates

Transport Layer Protection Checklists

  • TLS Is Enabled
  • TLS Is Used for All Sensitive Pages
  • Only Strong TLS Algorithms Are Used
  • Valid TLS Certificates Are Used
